mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task(major_id, task_date, add_state) VALUES (#{majorId}, #{date}, #{addState});
INSERT INTO task_detail(task_id, question_id, student_id) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{questionId},#{studentId});
mapper.select: SELECT task.id, newMajor.name AS majorName, task_date, add_state FROM task JOIN (SELECT id, name FROM major) AS newMajor ON newMajor.id = task.major_id;
